programme.title: The Nest
programme.desc: A biological experiment goes haywire when meat-eating mutant roaches invade an island community.

programme.title: The Slumber Party Massacre
programme.desc: Trish's slumber party for her basketball teammates includes an unexpected guest.

programme.title: The Slumber Party Massacre II
programme.desc: A teen and her friends are terrorized by a rock star whose guitar is fitted with a drill bit.

programme.title: Mortuary
programme.desc: Christie's nightmares grow worse after her father drowns, revealing a sinister truth tied to the mortuary.

programme.title: Piranha
programme.desc: When flesh-eating piranhas are accidentally released into a resort's rivers, the guests become their next meal.

programme.title: Horror Bites
programme.desc: Small tales, big terror... In this Horror Bites marathon, bite-sized stories deliver spine-chilling scares in under 20 minutes. From twisted encounters to nightmarish twists, these short horrors pack a punch, proving that sometimes the scariest tales come in small doses.

programme.title: The Most Dangerous Game
programme.desc: A psychotic big game hunter deliberately strands a luxury yacht on a remote island, where he begins to hunt its passengers for sport.

programme.title: Elvira's Movie Macabre
programme.sub-title: Elvira's Movie Macabre: Legacy of Blood
programme.desc: Three sisters hear the reading of their dead father's will. His fortune is theirs ... if they survive.

programme.title: Amityville: A New Generation
programme.desc: A photographer is given an old mirror and demonic forces project a grisly fate upon the mirror's surface.

programme.title: Sleepaway Camp
programme.desc: After a terrible boating accident killed her family, shy Angela Baker is sent to Camp Arawak where a series of bizarre and violent �accidents� occur.

programme.title: The Convent
programme.desc: A group of college students breaks into an abandoned convent, only to discover that it's inhabited by demons.

programme.title: The Stepfather
programme.desc: After murdering his entire family, a man marries a widow with a teenage daughter in another town and prepares to do it all over again.

programme.title: Better Watch Out
programme.desc: While babysitting at Christmas, Ashley is forced to defend herself and the child against unwelcome intruders.

programme.title: Fright
programme.desc: A babysitter is terrorized by the child's father who's recently escaped from a nearby psychiatric institution.

programme.title: Sweet 16
programme.desc: Melissa tries to make friends in her new town, but each of the boys she spends time with is found murdered.
